meanings.sent1: The introducers at the party made sure everyone felt welcome.
meanings.sent2: The new student introducers helped the incoming students feel comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The introducers at the event were like friendly guides for the guests.
meanings.sent4: She was the introducers of fun into our group, always bringing laughter.
meanings.sent5: The introducers of joy, they spread happiness wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used to introduce something
meanings.sent1: The introducers of the presentation were the slides that explained each point.
meanings.sent2: The introducers of the show were the flashy lights and music.
meanings.sent3: The introducers of the game were the colorful game pieces.
meanings.sent4: The key was the introducers to unlocking the mystery box.
meanings.sent5: The introducers, like a bridge, connected the two parts seamlessly.

meanings.definition: A chemical substance that facilitates the introduction of another substance
meanings.sent1: The introducers in the experiment helped mix the solutions effectively.
meanings.sent2: The introducers in the recipe enhanced the flavors of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The introducers in the potion made it bubble and fizz magically.
meanings.sent4: The introducers in the formula made the reaction occur faster.
meanings.sent5: The introducers, like a magic potion, transformed the liquid into gold.
